group_1.narration: "France will be lost because of a woman,@and shall thereafter be restored by a maiden...?"
"Where did you hear of that?"

group_1.textCenter: Umm... On my day off from work...
...I heard it on my way back from enjoying@a morality play...

group_1.narration: "Morality play?"
"That is hardly a noble hobby, is it?"

group_1.textCenter: I know, a friend of mine took me to it by@surprise...

group_1.narration: "Well, regardless, I understand your point."
"That woman it speaks of..."
"It must refer to Isabeau de Bavière."
"Is that what the people are saying about her?"

group_1.textCenter: Yes... That's what it sounds like...

group_1.narration: "Utterly foolish."
"I was not referring to you."
"Such propaganda is typically spread@by political opponents."
"It is nothing more than a rumor@with no basis in reality."
"You needn't take it so seriously.@However..."
"Since you went to the trouble of reporting it,@you must have felt that it was quite@a widely circulated rumor, yes?"

group_1.textCenter: Yes... That's what it looks like...

group_1.narration: "Even if it is no more than@an imbecile prophecy..."
"Such a ridiculous prophecy could indeed@fulfill itself if many people believe in it."
"Thank you for bringing this to my attention."

group_1.textCenter: N-no, I should be the one showing gratitude.
Thank you for listening to me!

group_1.narration: 'France will be lost because of a woman,@and shall thereafter be restored by a maiden.'
I don't think it's a meaningful prophecy.
However...@Why does it trouble me so...?
Indeed, there are women who@could be Mother's enemies.
Duchess of Anjou, Violant d'Aragó,@who defies the Burgundians...
Or, in the event of future territorial expansion,@the Holy Roman Emperor's wife, Barbara Celjska,@may one day be an enemy.
...However, they are women,@not "maidens"...
...I remember now! Indeed, it is as@my dear sister Lapin once said...
Once upon a time,@when Mother was more eloquent,@the thing she feared most was...
..."other Magical Girls" attempting to kill her!
—Minou—@Mother...@I have come here today to make a request...
—Minou—@Would you allow me to become a Magical Girl?
—Isabeau—@...You wish...@...for a miracle...?
—Minou—@Yes, my wish for you is...
—Minou—@"That Mother shall not be defeated@by any type of Magical Girl in existence!"
